courses: [{"subtitle":"-","title":"Data Mining, Statistical Simulation and Data Analysis"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Data Structures and algorithms, Theory of computation, Parallel Algorithms"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Econometrics"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Microeconomics, Macroeconomics, Money and Banking, Monetary Theory"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Probability Theory, Stochastic Processes"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Regression Analysis, Time Series Analysis,"}]
projects: [{"title":"Multidimensional Outlier Detection for Large Datasets","start_date":"Aug 2012","end_date":"Apr 2013","description":"- Reviewed literature on outlier detection for large datasets. Reworked on algorithms using concept of neural network, random walk and other generic methods for finding outliers. - Simulated methods based on Local Cor-relational Integral and Replicating Neural Nework and both the algorithms worked well for HBK dataset. - Tools Used: Matlab/R"},{"title":"Parallel Algorithms for Hierarchical Clustering","start_date":"Jan 2012","end_date":"Apr 2012","description":"- Designed and implemented sequential and parallel algorithms for Hierarchical clustering for datasets using MPI(message passing interface) system.- Result: Complexity for parallel algorithm decreased by increasing number of processors, while speed increased linearly. Tools; C/MATLAB"},{"title":"Web Based Data Mining: Selling Strategies for Online Auctions","start_date":"Aug 2011","end_date":"Nov 2011","description":"- Aim was to come up with selling strategies for online auctions. Data for 300 sellers in ebay was collected- Used CART( Classification and Regression Trees) predictive modeling and proposed effective selling models as a function of seller's priority( success/price)- We found that factors like shipping price, seller rating and item description determined auction's success/failure - Also used logistic regression to check the effectiveness of CART. Tools: R/SAS"},{},{},{"title":"\"P VS NP Problem: Analysis with Examples\"","start_date":"Aug 2010","end_date":"Nov 2010","description":"- Studied deterministic and non deterministic algorithms for Boolean Satisfiability(SAT), Vertex Cover Problem(VCP)"},{},{"title":"Trade Liberalization and India : Influence of Trade on FDI","start_date":"Aug 2010","end_date":"Nov 2010","description":"- Studied the Impact of trade on FDI inflows in India. Cross-border trade(CBT), Intra-industry trade(IIT) and inter-state trade(IST) were forms of trade that affected FDI inflows- Used multiple linear regression model and found R-square to be 82% with CBT being the most significant variable- Data Sources: ASI, CMIE, RBI reports: Tools: Eviews"},{"title":"Miniature Car Crusher Machine","start_date":"Aug 2009","end_date":"Nov 2009","description":"- Designed a mechanical model for crushing of used cans(normal size) and other miniature metallic objects - Assembled a miniature crane along with crushing machine on the same platform"},{}]
